translation.en: [Trudy] We gonna have to take it out of our own bank.
translation.de: Wir nehmen Geld aus unserer Bank.

translation.en: [man] We don't have that type of money, Trudy.
translation.de: So viel Geld haben wir nicht, Trudy.

translation.en: We only got a few pennies over $2,500.
translation.de: Wir haben nur etwas mehr als 2500 $.

translation.en: What did he say?
-[man] 2,500-- -I heard you.
-[Trudy] Wiley. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah.
[Rufus] Sure is hot, ain't it?
What's up, little man?
-You wanna see something? -[boy] Yeah.
Watch this now. Don't take your eyes off it.
Oh, it's still there! [laughs]
Look at you.
Relic of yesteryear with nothin'.
translation.de: Ein Relikt der Vergangenheit und ein Habenichts.

translation.en: And you think you can roll into my town and take what belong to me?
translation.de: Du willst dir in meiner Stadt nehmen, was mir gehört?

translation.en: Who the fuck you think I am, huh?
Ain't nobody scared of you and ain't nobody runnin'.
translation.de: Keiner hat Angst vor dir, keiner läuft weg.

translation.en: I'm a sinister motherfucker too.
One click of my finger and you disappear.
translation.de: Ich schnippe mit dem Finger, und du stirbst.

translation.en: So I suggest you leave…
before I finish my steak.
-And if you even think about sticking-- -[knocking on door]
Come in.
What is it, Carson?
Sheriff, Mr. Buck wants to see you out front.
Tell that man I ain't got nothing to say to him.
translation.de: Ich hab dem Mann nichts zu sagen.

translation.en: It wasn't a request.
[Rufus] You wanna sell this town while I rot in prison?
translation.de: Willst du die Stadt verkaufen, während ich im Knast verrotte?

translation.en: The world you knew is gone.
There's a flood comin'.
Do you think you can hold onto this place when it hit?
translation.de: Glaubst du, du kannst sie hier überstehen?

translation.en: At least I know enough to get mine and get out.
translation.de: Ich bin wenigstens schlau genug, abzuhauen.

translation.en: Kill me…
and you'll have nothing.
You know, a man like you will have us all subservient
translation.de: Ein Mann wie du wird uns auf ewig

translation.en: till the end of our days
so's long as you can buy yourself a house,
a badge, and them goddamn gold teeth.
translation.de: einen Stern und die blöden Goldzähne kaufen kannst.

translation.en: You want to do this here?
[Wiley] There you go. That's what you want, right?
translation.de: Na schön. Das willst du also?

translation.en: That's what you came here for?
I won't disappoint you. Come on.
That's what you want. Want some more?
You want some more, right? You want some more?
translation.de: Du willst noch mehr, oder? Mehr?

translation.en: [Rufus] Come here, motherfucker.
Here you go.
Oh shit. I done hit gold.
translation.de: Scheiße. Ich bin auf Gold gestoßen.

translation.en: Hey, boy. Come here. Come, get that gold. Get that gold.
translation.de: Junge, komm her. Schnapp dir das Gold.

translation.en: All right. Tell your mama you rich now! Go ahead!
translation.de: Sag deiner Mama, ihr seid jetzt reich!

translation.en: [Rufus] Now, I ain't gonna kill you, Wiley.
[echoing] You and I were friends once.
But know this. Redwood will never be yours, never.
translation.de: Aber Redwood wird niemals dir gehören.

translation.en: Never.
Matter of fact, you ain't welcome here no more.
translation.de: Du bist hier nicht mehr willkommen.

translation.en: Now…
I want you to vacate immediately or die where you lay.
translation.de: …hau sofort ab oder stirb hier auf der Stelle.

translation.en: Say what?
That's right.
You coulda taken these off a while back. Yep.
Tell me something. How you know Rufus will be in Redwood?
translation.de: Woher wissen Sie, dass Rufus in Redwood ist?

translation.en: [Nat] He's taking that money from them Crimson Hoods. That's where he'll be.
translation.de: Er will das Geld von den Crimsons. Da wird er sein.

translation.en: Now you teaming up with a marshal to bring him in.
translation.de: Sie wollen ihn zusammen mit mir verhaften?

translation.en: I ain't bringing him in. I'm bringing him down.
And we ain't teaming up, old man.
Your life's expendable, Marshal. My gang's ain't.
translation.de: Sie sind entbehrlich. Meine Gang nicht.

translation.en: Shit, since we're out here, I oughta tell you…
I was fixin' to kill you…
when you and your fellas brought in Rufus.
A lot of men be fixin', son.
They always seem to die before they get the job done.
translation.de: Doch sie scheinen vorher immer zu sterben.

translation.en: Just for the record…
I took Rufus in alone.
[Nat] Mary.
I figured you'd be halfway to Fort Smith by now.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du bist schon fast in Fort Smith.

translation.en: You can put that gun down, Marshal. This ain't a ambush.
translation.de: Waffe runter, Marshal. Das ist kein Hinterhalt.

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might wanna keep yours handy.
Do you think I'm stupid enough to fall for that bullshit y'all pulled in my saloon?
translation.de: Glaubt ihr, ich bin auf den Mist in meinem Saloon reingefallen?

translation.en: I don't want you mixed up in this no more.
Then you shoulda told me so.
I must confess to some raw feelings myself.
translation.de: Ich muss zugeben, ich war auch sauer.

translation.en: This ain't no road to ask a friend to travel.
Now you take that money we took off them Crimson Hoods
translation.de: Nehmt euch das Geld von den Crimson Hoods,

translation.en: and you buy that ranch you always blabbing about. Hmm?
translation.de: und du kaufst dir eine Ranch.

translation.en: That's mighty generous of you, but that ain't how this gang work.
translation.de: Sehr großzügig, aber so läuft das nicht.

translation.en: Take stays in the usual place, ready to be shared three ways when we come back.
translation.de: Wir teilen die Beute bei der Rückkehr wie immer durch drei.

translation.en: Ain't no coming back from this.
Now get out of here.
All of you. This ain't your fight.
You take on the Devil himself, you gonna need more than you and the marshal.
translation.de: Gegen den Teufel brauchst du mehr als den Marshal.

translation.en: I seen the Devil, and Rufus Buck ain't him.
translation.de: Rufus Buck ist nicht der Teufel.

translation.en: Devil's white.
You got a reason you wanna die, Jim?
Outside of you saving me from this?
Besides, Monroe said Cherokee Bill run with Rufus.
translation.de: Außerdem sagt Monroe, Cherokee Bill ist bei Rufus.

translation.en: Every time I speak on my speed, a motherfucker wanna pull Cherokee Bill out they ass.
translation.de: Und ich höre ständig jemanden sagen, wie schnell er ist.

translation.en: I'ma put a end to that argument once and for all.
translation.de: Ich sorge dafür, dass das aufhört.

translation.en: Like they say in the Book of Clarence, "No man out-speed me."
translation.de: Wie steht's im Buche Clarence? "Niemand ist schneller als ich."

translation.en: Out-speed ain't a word, and Clarence ain't no book.
translation.de: Das ist doch nur dummes Gerede.

translation.en: I'm hopin' Cherokee put a bullet in your ass just to shut you up.
translation.de: Wenn Cherokee dich abknallt, ist mal Ruhe.

translation.en: -Hey. -You left these on my wall, Mr. Love.
translation.de: Das hast du vergessen, Mr. Love.

translation.en: Figured we going after villains, you'll need 'em.
Obliged.
What y'all waiting around for?
You think destiny is comin' to you?
translation.de: Dass das Schicksal zu euch kommt?

translation.en: Hyup! Go!
-Yeah. I know. -[horse whinnies]
Go ahead.
[Rufus] How do I look?
[Trudy] All right.
Everybody out there?
Just about.
How could you do it?
Leave all of this to Wiley?
translation.de: Wieso hast du alles Wiley gelassen?

translation.en: If you were runnin' Redwood,
who woulda kept the operation goin'?
Who else woulda kept all them gangs in line?
translation.de: Wer sonst hält die Gangs in Schach?

translation.en: Look, I know that Wiley got his ways, but he was loyal once.
translation.de: Ich weiß, Wiley bekam, was er wollte, aber er war mal Anwalt.

translation.en: Loyalty is a virtue, Rufus.
Till it ain't.
You loyal to me?
See these folk here?
Either they can't see it or they don't want to.
translation.de: Sie können oder wollen es nicht einsehen.

translation.en: But I believe in what you're doing.
This place can be the promised land for us.
translation.de: Dieser Ort könnte das Gelobte Land für uns sein.

translation.en: And as long as that so, ain't nothing I won't do to see it through.
translation.de: Und ich tue alles, um das zu verwirklichen.

translation.en: You tell them.
[Trudy] Citizens of Redwood.
A new day is dawning.
As by now you have doubtless learned,
the territory will officially open up for settlement.
translation.de: dass das Gebiet offiziell zur Besiedlung freisteht.

translation.en: Now they say everything we own is gonna stay our own.
translation.de: Sie sagen, was wir besitzen, gehört weiterhin uns.

translation.en: But you know as well as I do how much that's worth.
translation.de: Aber ihr wisst, wie viel das wert ist.

translation.en: See, your land, your businesses, your homes
translation.de: Euer Land, eure Geschäfte, eure Häuser

translation.en: has all been promised to the highest bidders
by your one-time sheriff, Wiley Escoe.
translation.de: von eurem vorherigen Sheriff Wiley Escoe versprochen.

translation.en: Now, Mr. Buck can prevent this from happening.
But in order for us to do that, it's necessary that we levy a tax.
translation.de: Doch darauf müssen wir eine Steuer erheben.

translation.en: -[crowd muttering] -At what cost to us?
You could scrape every penny from every living soul in this town,
translation.de: Selbst, wenn Sie jedem hier den letzten Cent nehmen,

translation.en: and it wouldn't come near to that.
You got us between a rock and a hard place.
How long you been alive in this country?
translation.de: Wie lange lebt ihr schon hier?

translation.en: A rock and a hard place is what we call Monday.
translation.de: Wir sind es gewohnt, in der Klemme zu sitzen.

translation.en: I've heard of Rufus Buck.
How bad a man he is.
But he got himself thrown in jail once before,
translation.de: Er saß schon mal im Knast,

translation.en: and I reckon he'll be back there again soon enough.
translation.de: und dort wird er bald wieder landen.

translation.en: When he is, maybe I'll come back to this town.
translation.de: Dann komme ich vielleicht hierher zurück.

translation.en: 'Cause I ain't paying shit.
You think I made Redwood for myself?
translation.de: Glaubt ihr, Redwood ist für mich?

translation.en: To what end?
Redwood ain't a hiding place, 'cause I don't hide.
translation.de: Redwood ist kein Versteck. Ich verstecke mich nicht.

translation.en: It ain't a dream. I don't dream.
translation.de: Es ist kein Traum. Ich träume nicht.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It's an example.
It's an example…
for others to follow.
And you…
you are an enemy of progress.
translation.de: Du bist ein Feind des Fortschritts.

translation.en: Please. Please.
-I got a family. -What's your name?
[Rufus] Rest in peace, James.
Now, how much?
How much can be gathered?
Ten thousand.
Maybe 15, if every last cent can be squeezed.
translation.de: Vielleicht 15, bis auf den letzten Cent.

translation.en: Ain't nobody leave town until we collect it all.
translation.de: Niemand verlässt die Stadt, bis wir das Geld haben.

translation.en: And if you fail to comply,
you and everything you love will burn.
translation.de: verbrennt ihr und alles, was ihr liebt.

translation.en: I ain't got nothin' to rob.
But I got somebody to shoot. Step down.
translation.de: Aber ich hab was zum Erschießen. Absitzen.

translation.en: Fuck.
Redwood crawling with gunmen.
Rufus came with 12 and took six of mine.
translation.de: Rufus kam mit 12 und nahm sechs meiner Männer.

translation.en: Who knows how many he got by now.
I don't believe a thing this man sayin'.
He a scout. I say we kill him.
translation.de: Er ist ein Spitzel. Töten wir ihn.

translation.en: And we take the rest of them teeth.
You ever shot a sheriff, boy? A mayor?
translation.de: Schon mal einen Sheriff erschossen? Und Bürgermeister?

translation.en: Little harder than shootin' regular folk. And I'm both.
translation.de: Ist schwerer, als normale Leute abknallen. Und ich bin beides.

translation.en: [Bass] You both alive and dead 'cause Rufus don't like loose ends.
translation.de: Du bist lebendig und tot, denn Rufus lässt nichts unerledigt.

translation.en: Law don't find a man like Rufus Buck unless you got inside information.
translation.de: Einen wie Rufus Buck kriegt man nur durch Insider-Informationen.

translation.en: Ain't that right, Wiley?
If I had my way, you'd be right up under the jail next to Rufus.
translation.de: Ich würde dich auch einbuchten, neben Rufus.

translation.en: But you cut yourself a deal, wound up wearing a badge instead.
translation.de: Aber du hast 'nen Deal, hast 'nen Stern gekriegt.

translation.en: You got your reasons you want Rufus gone, and I got mine.
translation.de: Wir beide haben Gründe, warum wir Rufus loswerden wollen.

translation.en: Ain't the enemy of my enemy my friend?
translation.de: Meines Feindes Feind ist mein Freund.

translation.en: Rufus tryin' to save Redwood. But for that, he need money.
translation.de: Rufus will Redwood retten. Aber dazu braucht er Geld.

translation.en: And that's one thing he ain't have.
All right, look here. You made a deal with the Devil.
translation.de: Du hast einen Pakt mit dem Teufel geschlossen.

translation.en: Now he come to collect.
You rest up, but be gone before sunup.
translation.de: Ruh dich aus, aber hau vor Sonnenaufgang ab.

translation.en: Or it's gonna go from bad to badder. You hear?
translation.de: Oder es wird noch schlimmer für dich.

translation.en: Marshal. Marshal. Marshal.
All them tricks'll get you killed, son.
[Jim] Listen, Marshal.
I'm faster than any weapon. You can trust in that.
translation.de: Ich bin schneller als jede Waffe. Glauben Sie mir.

translation.en: I seen faster.
All right. Where?
In the mirror.
Negro said, "In the mirror."
[Jim] I'm so… I'm sorry.
I rather ride into a gun battle on a dark horse over a golden stallion.
translation.de: Ich reite lieber auf einem schwarzen Pferd als auf 'nem Goldhengst.

translation.en: -Fuck that mean? -Shiny shit get shot.
You gonna shoot me?
What you think about that, lawman?
I think y'all gonna die.
[Nat singing] ♪ And away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
♪ As her garden grows ♪
♪ Hold those flowers close ♪
♪ For away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
I'll be back with information by sunup.
Information from where?
Redwood.
You know we can't trust Wiley's word.
Someone's got to get the lay of the land before we make our next move.
translation.de: Jemand muss die Lage beurteilen, bevor wir weiterreiten.

translation.en: Yeah, Mary, but that somebody ain't got to be you.
translation.de: Mary, das musst aber nicht du sein.

translation.en: Every gunhand in the territory's gonna recognize you the second you hop off your horse.
translation.de: Dich erkennt doch in der Stadt sofort jeder Gauner.

translation.en: Same with Bill and Beckwourth.
In case you forgot,
your face more famous than all of ours put together, Stagecoach Mary.
translation.de: dein Gesicht ist berühmter als wir alle, Stagecoach Mary.

translation.en: Got it up on advertisements for that saloon of yours from here to Texas.
translation.de: Du hast damit überall für den Saloon geworben.

translation.en: Which is why I can ride into town in plain sight.
translation.de: Und deshalb kann ich auch in die Stadt reiten.

translation.en: Everybody knows I'm buying saloons.
translation.de: Ich kaufe Saloons. Rufus braucht Geld.

translation.en: Rufus need money. I'ma make him an offer on Trudy Smith's place--
translation.de: Ich kaufe Saloons. Rufus braucht Geld. -Ich mache ihm ein Angebot für Trudys… -Mary, wieso sollte ich das erlauben?

translation.en: Mary, what in my character makes you think I'll allow that?
translation.de: -Ich mache ihm ein Angebot für Trudys… -Mary, wieso sollte ich das erlauben?

translation.en: I'm not asking for your permission.
All right.
Then I… I guess I'll just be asking you for yours.
translation.de: Dann bitte ich eben um deine.

translation.en: Since you'll never let a man give you away, I just have to ask you direct.
translation.de: Da du es anders nicht zulässt, frage ich dich direkt.

translation.en: That's the ring my father gave my mother.
translation.de: Mein Vater gab den meiner Mutter.

translation.en: I was gonna give it to you back in Douglas.
translation.de: Ich wollte ihn dir in Douglas geben.

translation.en: But you didn't.
I am now.
I used to hate feeling helpless over you.
Those days are over now.
When the dust settles, we gonna go our separate ways, for good.
translation.de: Wenn sich der Staub legt, gehen wir unserer Wege.

translation.en: But not till the dust settles. I'm here till then.
translation.de: Aber bis dahin bleibe ich hier.

translation.en: See you sunup.
Are you a resident of Redwood, ma'am?
translation.de: Sind Sie Bürgerin von Redwood, Ma'am?

translation.en: You don't own a gun confident enough to ask where I reside.
translation.de: Ihre Waffe ist nicht groß genug, um mir Fragen zu stellen.

translation.en: Well, this gun say answer the damn question.
translation.de: Meine Waffe will aber eine Antwort.

translation.en: Well, this gun don't talk.
[Trudy] Stagecoach Mary.
Ghastly Gertrude Smith.
I prefer Treacherous Trudy myself, but I'll take it.
translation.de: Ich bevorzuge Tückische Trudy, aber okay.

translation.en: What brings you to my town?
I heard Rufus Buck was back.
translation.de: Ich hörte, Rufus Buck ist zurück.

translation.en: -News travels fast. -[man chuckles]
I have an offer he might wanna hear about.
translation.de: Ich habe ein Angebot für ihn.

translation.en: Well, any offer you got, you can make it to me.
translation.de: Das kannst du auch mir machen.

translation.en: I don't do business with the help.
Give me that shit.
Lead the way, Treacherous Trudy.
translation.de: Zeig mir den Weg, Tückische Trudy.

translation.en: Speak your piece.
I assume you know who I am.
I assume you know who I used to run with.
translation.de: Und mit wem ich früher ritt.

translation.en: Those days are over for me anyhow,
but I didn't get to be Stagecoach Mary Fields
translation.de: aber ich bin Stagecoach Mary Fields,

translation.en: without having my ears to the ground
translation.de: weil ich immer auf dem Laufenden bin.

translation.en: and my ears tell me you just lost 25 thou that was coming your way.
translation.de: und ich habe gehört, Sie haben 25 Riesen verloren.

translation.en: [Trudy] I hope your proposal rivals your nerve--
Allow me the latitude of completion.
My saloon in Douglas is boomin'.
Bought me another one in the Elks, and I got a restaurant in Cascade too.
translation.de: Ich hab noch einen in Elks und ein Restaurant in Cascade.

translation.en: For the sum of all that, I could take this one off your hands.
translation.de: Für alle drei kauf ich Ihnen diesen ab.

translation.en: The mere mention of my name brings forth good business
to any establishment attached, whereas,
with all due respect, but the name Rufus Buck instils fear.
translation.de: Der Name Rufus Buck hingegen, bei allem Respekt, schürt nur Angst.

translation.en: We know who you are.
You walkin' into my town with that proposal is risky.
translation.de: Hier mit so einem Angebot anzukommen, ist riskant.

translation.en: The kind of risk a woman such as yourself wouldn't tie herself to
translation.de: Eine Frau wie Sie würde so ein Risiko nicht eingehen,

translation.en: unless there was a whole lot more at stake.
translation.de: wenn es nicht um mehr ginge.

translation.en: See, I don't believe in coincidence,
like you just gonna walk in here
translation.de: wie an den, dass Sie herkommen, nachdem die Crimson Hoods

translation.en: right after the Crimson Hoods get ambushed with my money.
translation.de: wie an den, dass Sie herkommen, nachdem die Crimson Hoods mein Geld verloren haben.

translation.en: What are you thinking?
You must have forgot whose name is on the door.
translation.de: Schon vergessen, wessen Laden das ist?

translation.en: Another round.
We havin' a party, y'all. Come on.
[Nat] All right, Mary.
All right.
So you still sayin' you don't know nothin' about that money and you done come here alone?
translation.de: Du weißt also nichts von dem Geld und bist allein hier?

translation.en: That's right.
You done rode all the way over here to get yourself killed.
translation.de: Du bist so weit gekommen, um dich töten zu lassen.

translation.en: And for what?
For love?
Love is the only thing worth dying for.
translation.de: Nur dafür lohnt es sich zu sterben.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that.
You know, I had a sister named Mary.
translation.de: Ich hatte eine Schwester, die Mary hieß.

translation.en: She was pretty, strong-willed, like you.
translation.de: Sie war hübsch, eigensinnig, wie du.

translation.en: She died of polio when I was 11.
Always was in pain, but she'd never let me see her cry.
translation.de: Sie hatte immer Schmerzen, weinte aber nie vor mir.

translation.en: There's this girl called Hope lived by us.
translation.de: Dann war da dieses Mädchen Hope. Sie wohnte nebenan.

translation.en: Big fat kid, always picking on the smaller kids.
translation.de: Sie war fett und ärgerte immer die Kleineren.

translation.en: Obviously out of jealousy.
But she ain't never fuck with me though.
translation.de: Mit mir legte sie sich nie an.

translation.en: She hated Mary with a passion,
always teasing her about how thin and frail she was.
translation.de: und hänselte sie immer, weil sie dünn und gebrechlich war.

translation.en: Then one day, Hope walkin' by our house,
translation.de: Eines Tages geht Hope am Haus vorbei,

translation.en: apple in one hand, blade in the other.
translation.de: einen Apfel und ein Messer in den Händen.

translation.en: She decided to throw the apple across the street at Mary,
translation.de: Sie warf den Apfel quer über die Straße auf Mary.

translation.en: and it hit my sister in the head and knocked her out of balance.
translation.de: Sie traf sie am Kopf und Mary verlor das Gleichgewicht.

translation.en: She fell down the steps.
Broke her ankle.
And now that…
that was the first and only time I physically seen my sister cry.
translation.de: Da sah ich meine Schwester zum ersten und letzten Mal weinen.

translation.en: And there was Hope standing there laughin' her ugly fuckin' face off.
translation.de: Und Hope stand da und lachte sich halbtot.

translation.en: My daddy…
he got home,
he took off his belt, and he beat me for not protecting my sister.
translation.de: schlug er mich mit dem Gürtel, weil ich meine Schwester nicht beschützt hatte.

translation.en: He lashed me until my whole body went numb.
translation.de: Er schlug mich, bis mein Körper taub war.

translation.en: Then
he went to Hope house to do the same thing to her.
translation.de: ging er zu Hope, um das Gleiche mit ihr zu tun.

translation.en: When he got there, he saw her whole family standin' on the side of the house,
translation.de: Er sah ihre ganze Familie vor dem Haus stehen.

translation.en: all of 'em screamin' and cryin',
and there was Hope…
lyin' on the floor in a pool of blood.
Somebody had slit her throat. Killed her with her own knife.
translation.de: Jemand hatte ihr die Kehle mit ihrem eigenen Messer aufgeschlitzt.

translation.en: Daddy was speechless.
He ain't said a word to me when he came home.
translation.de: Er sagte kein Wort zu mir, als er heimkam.

translation.en: The next day, he sent me to live with my grandparents.
translation.de: Am nächsten Tag schickte er mich zu meinen Großeltern.

translation.en: And then the next time I seen my sister,
she was laying in a coffin.
Disease had killed her.
I'm sorry your sister had to suffer.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass deine Schwester litt.

translation.en: I admire her bravery.
But you get no words from me.
translation.de: Aber mein Mitgefühl hast du nicht.

translation.en: You know, I actually admire your bravery.
But I'm afraid the outcome is still the outcome.
Hope must die.
But not yet.
Leave her out here in the street so everybody can see her.
translation.de: Lasst sie hier auf der Straße, damit alle sie sehen.

translation.en: No one come to collect her 'fore sunup, put a bullet in her head.
translation.de: Holt sie bis Sonnenaufgang niemand ab, erschießt sie.

translation.en: [man] Yes, ma'am.
Looks like we don't have to wait that long.
Whoever die first, right?
-Whoever die first. -[Jim] Mmm-hmm.
Get her up.
"Whoever die first"?
Now, what kind of dumbass saying is that?
translation.de: Was ist das für ein blöder Spruch?

translation.en: You two trying to get shot out here?
Nat Love. How predictable.
You predict my friend Bill Pickett aiming at your bowler cap?
translation.de: Hast du damit gerechnet, dass Bill Pickett auf dich zielt?

translation.en: You'll be dead before your boys get their aim.
translation.de: Du bist tot, ehe deine Jungs zielen.

translation.en: And you die right after.
But your boss won't see one red cent of that money.
translation.de: Aber dein Boss wird keinen Cent sehen.

translation.en: My boss?
Where is he?
Where is who?
[Nat] Marshal.
I'm speakin' English, yeah? -Sound like English to me. -[Nat] Mmm-hmm.
Where's Rufus Buck?
[Bass] Trudy.
If I'd known you were switchin' sides, I'da asked you to come join us.
translation.de: Du hättest auch auf unsere Seite wechseln können.

translation.en: You here for your damsel in distress?
You don't look hard of hearing.
So I'ma ask you again.
Where's Rufus Buck?
Well, clearly, you don't know me.
Tell your men to go, but you stay,
translation.de: Deine Männer sollen gehen, aber du bleibst,

translation.en: and maybe your damsel will live a little longer.
translation.de: dann lebt dein Mädel vielleicht länger.

translation.en: You're pretty though.
-Ah, take her ass back in there. -Yes, ma'am.
Gonna get me a drink.
That the quick draw I hear tell about, Cherokee Bill?
translation.de: Bist du der flinke Cherokee Bill?

translation.en: I hear you so fast that your opponents ain't got time to draw
translation.de: Man sagt, du bist so schnell, dass dein Gegner

translation.en: before you put two in they back.
No, that ain't me.
I'm the Cherokee Bill that shoots men in the mouth that talk too much.
I'll make it easy for you, then.
You draw first.
That what you think this is? "Who the quickest draw in the West?"
translation.de: Du glaubst, es geht darum, wer am schnellsten zieht?

translation.en: All comes down to who fast and who ain't, right?
translation.de: Was zählt, ist, wer schnell ist.

translation.en: No, it all comes down to who's alive and who's dead.
translation.de: Nein, es zählt, wer lebt und wer nicht.

translation.en: Trudy, I'm gonna get me something to drink.
Good night.
Hey, hey, drink, my ass, man.
-I practiced that standoff all night. -Jim.
-[Jim] You're not about to walk away. -[Nat] Get out of here.
translation.de: Du gehst nicht einfach so weg.

translation.en: -No, nobody-- -[Nat] Get out of here, Jim.
-[Jim] That chicken-- -[Bass] It ain't the time.
Okay. Okay.
[man] March, boy.
-I said march! -March.
Hup, two, three, four.
That's enough.
They beat you bad?
I'ma kill 'em all.
[Rufus] You familiar with Napoleon?
He said, "I am driven towards an end that I do not know."
translation.de: Er sagte: "Ich gehe auf ein unbekanntes Ende zu.

translation.en: "As I reach it, as I shall become unnecessary,
translation.de: Wenn ich es erreiche und überflüssig werde,

translation.en: an atom shall suffice to shatter me."
translation.de: soll ein Atom allein mich zerbrechen können.

translation.en: "Until then, all forces of humankind can do nothing to stop me."
translation.de: Doch bis dahin kann keine Kraft mich aufhalten."

translation.en: That's a man who knew exactly who he was.
translation.de: Er wusste genau, wer er war.

translation.en: Most importantly, he knew that his time would come to an end.
translation.de: Aber er wusste vor allem, dass seine Zeit kommen würde.

translation.en: Cut him down.
You know why…
I gave you that scar?
[Nat] So I'd remember you.
[Rufus] No.
No, I gave you that scar so I can know your face when you come back to me.
translation.de: Damit ich dich erkenne, wenn du dich rächen willst.

translation.en: the outlaw who robs outlaws,
the angel of death who hunts down those who trespass against him with no mercy.
translation.de: Der Todesengel, der jene gnadenlos jagt, die ihm etwas antun wollen.

translation.en: I know who you are.
And I see the line that you won't cross.
translation.de: Und ich weiß, wie weit du gehst.

translation.en: See, I know what's on the other side.
Apologize for the beating.
It was more of an indication for what Ms. Fields might see
translation.de: Jetzt weißt du, was Ms. Fields erwartet,

translation.en: if we fail to come to terms.
[Nat] What terms?
You will return the money you stole from me by Friday noon.
translation.de: Bis Freitagmittag bringst du mir mein Geld zurück.

translation.en: Not a moment later.
And you will add $10,000 on top of that. We'll call that interest.
translation.de: Zusätzlich bringst du mir 10 000 $. Nennen wir es Zinsen.

translation.en: Somethin' funny?
Ooh, shit, how… how you reckon I'ma get that?
translation.de: Scheiße… Wo soll ich das herkriegen?

translation.en: You're gonna rob a bank.
Nat Love is gonna rob a bank.
translation.de: Nat Love raubt eine Bank aus.

translation.en: In the meantime, here's a little token of my appreciation in advance.
translation.de: Hier ist schon mal ein kleines Dankeschön von mir.

translation.en: Go ahead, open it.
I expect my money on Friday.
translation.de: Ich erwarte mein Geld am Freitag.

translation.en: All of it.
[Bass] You know I can't let you do that.
If that money ain't in Rufus' hands in three days, Mary'll die.
translation.de: Wenn Rufus nicht das Geld kriegt, stirbt Mary.

translation.en: [Pickett] What bank we talking about anyway? [Nat] Maysville.
That's a white town.
Yeah, which is why they gonna have $10,000 in their bank.
It's crazy.
[Jim] My emotions are all types of confused.
I mean, Pickett, I agree. That's crazy.
translation.de: Pickett hat recht. Das ist verrückt.

translation.en: But, Nat, I also agree with you telling the marshal that we gonna do that shit anyways.
translation.de: Aber Nat hat auch recht, dass wir es trotzdem machen.

translation.en: That's some true outlaw shit.
-We outlaws, ain't we? -[Nat] Ain't no "we," Jim.
Not after that shit you pulled in town nearly got us all killed.
I had that.
[Nat] Fetch that money you took from the Crimson Hoods.
translation.de: Hol das Geld von den Crimson Hoods.

translation.en: Pickett, kid, you comin' with me.
If Rufus Buck want that bank took, why don't he send his own men?
translation.de: Warum schickt Rufus Buck nicht seine Männer?

translation.en: This way he clean, see?
I gotta go in barefaced as day,
a freshly minted bank robber, face up on wanted posters all over the territory.
translation.de: ein frischgebackener Bankräuber, der überall gesucht wird.

translation.en: They'll be on you like flies on shit before you open the door.
translation.de: Die umschwirren dich sofort wie Fliegen.

translation.en: Yep.
I said I had to be recognized.
translation.de: Ich sagte, mich muss man erkennen.

translation.en: Go ahead.
[Cuffee] Hell no.
For Mary.
Close shave.
Close fucking shave! I thought I was falling for a fella for a little bit.
translation.de: Echt knapp. Ich dachte schon, ich stehe auf Männer.

translation.en: That's why I didn't say nothing. Well, I ain't the only one. I can't…
translation.de: Also hab ich nichts gesagt. Ich bin nicht der Einzige.

translation.en: I can't… It wasn't just me. It wasn't just me.
It was just you, Jim.
[Cuffee] Giddup now.
-[Nat] Allow me. -[grunts]
What's your real name?
Cuffee my real name.
Name I was born with? Cathay Williams.
You walk worse than you ride, Cathay.
translation.de: Du gehst schlimmer als du reitest.

translation.en: Mr. Love, my momma always told me to respect my elders,
translation.de: Mutter brachte mir Respekt vor Älteren bei,

translation.en: so I'm not gonna say what I'm thinking.
That's all right. I can read your mind.
Then I'm sorry you had to hear that.
Go ahead.
Go ahead, honey.
[teller] Yes?
I'd like to make a withdrawal.
What…
You have to have an account, ma'am.
translation.de: Dazu brauchen Sie ein Konto, Ma'am.

translation.en: And, well, I'd recommend a bank in Jericho or maybe Redwood for that.
translation.de: Dazu empfehle ich eine Bank in Jericho oder Redwood.

translation.en: I'm not talking about that kinda withdrawal.
translation.de: Ich meine nicht die Art Abhebung.

translation.en: I'm talk--
I'm talking about…
talking about that kind.
Hey, blue eyes.
You scared.
Your hand is shaking. You'll miss.
I won't.
Exhale.
Attaboy.
I ain't like my partner.
He don't wanna shoot nobody, but all of a sudden, I'm of a mind to.
translation.de: Er will niemanden töten, aber ich bin anderer Meinung.

translation.en: Now open the fuckin' gate.
Think I'm funny now?
What you lookin' at?
Get all the customers over there.
-Get 'em over there! -Okay, okay.
-Everyone, please, this way quickly. -You too. Move!
Times have changed, ain't they?
translation.de: Die Zeiten haben sich geändert, was?

translation.en: They say robbing banks is hard work.
translation.de: Banken ausrauben soll ja schwer sein.

translation.en: That's a lie. Robbing banks is easy.
The hard part is doing it without killing.
translation.de: Schwer ist es, dabei niemanden zu töten.

translation.en: So, what'll it be…
Mr. Manager?
Good man.
[Cuffee] Come on. Let's go.
Come on. Giddyap. Go.
-Pleasure banking with you. -Okay, sir.
Don't even look like much.
Ain't what it look like. It's what it can buy you.
translation.de: Wichtiger ist, was man damit kaufen kann.

translation.en: Rufus won't let Mary go once he gets that money.
translation.de: Rufus wird Mary nicht laufen lassen.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it.
He'll kill her, let me go, so's I carry that hurt with me.
translation.de: Er wird sie töten, um mir wehzutun.

translation.en: So what, we just went through all that trouble for nothin'?
translation.de: Das war eben also alles umsonst?

translation.en: Now we got something he want.
And that's it?
Gonna have to be.
You can be all hasty and shoot me now if you want,
or you can wait to see what I brought with me first.
translation.de: oder sehen, was ich mitgebracht habe.

translation.en: [Wiley] Rufus got stashes like this all across these hills.
translation.de: Rufus hat überall in den Hügeln geheime Verstecke.

translation.en: Enough for a small army.
Don't nobody take what I got coming to me.
Not even the Devil himself.
[Bass] Rufus Buck is a man.
Y'all best reconcile yourselves with that fact.
translation.de: Findet euch am besten damit ab.

translation.en: Man or devil, this gonna be Buck's last day amongst the living.
translation.de: Mensch oder Teufel, seine letzte Stunde hat geschlagen.

translation.en: ♪ Upon my return ♪ ♪ See a changed soul ♪
translation.de: Ich bin zurück Doch ein and'rer Mann

translation.en: -♪ That road was far ♪ -♪ That road was far ♪
translation.de: -Dieser Weg war weit -Dieser Weg war weit

translation.en: -♪ And way too long ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ And way too long ♪
translation.de: -Und viel zu lang -Und viel zu lang

translation.en: -♪ They'll run from me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ They'll run from me ♪
translation.de: -Ihr lauft vor mir -Ihr lauft vor mir

translation.en: -♪ As they ran from you ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ As they ran from you ♪
translation.de: -Wie vor ihm davon -Wie vor ihm davon

translation.en: -♪ That fear in me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ That fear in me ♪
translation.de: -Die Angst in mir -Die Angst in mir

translation.en: ♪ Is in a distant view ♪
♪ Is ♪
♪ In a distant ♪
♪ View ♪
Afternoon.
I would ask you to run go fetch your superior,
translation.de: Ich würde dich ja bitten, deinen Boss zu holen,

translation.en: but that'd be like asking you to run go fetch your daddy.
translation.de: aber das wäre, wie deinen Papa zur Hilfe holen.

translation.en: It could be anybody, right?
You know,
I'm willing to bet my right arm
I've got a higher body count than yours.
translation.de: dass ich mehr Leute getötet habe.

translation.en: That'd be a bad bet, son.
I fancy that song or whatever it was you was whistling there.
translation.de: Der Song gefällt mir, den Sie da gepfiffen haben.

translation.en: [Bass] Go, Jerry. Go.
That our money?
Walk with me.
Hey, just… just walk with me.
-Keep an eye on this, Angel. -[Angel] Mmm-hmm.
You know they call your boss the Devil hisself?
translation.de: Man nennt deinen Boss den Teufel in Person.

translation.en: Even the Devil needed money, right?
So being as how we are in possession of that money…
translation.de: Und da wir das Geld haben,

translation.en: let me dictate the terms of engagement.
translation.de: bestimme ich die Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung.

translation.en: What the fuck was that? What the fuck was that, old man?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel war das, alter Mann?

translation.en: Is that the right arm or the left?
Oh man.
Well, now there's us…
and there's y'all.
You get a hold of your feisty buddy here.
You got a little rowdy rascal.
-Mary. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah, we'll get to that.
-We gonna count this first. -Now, Cherokee.
Or your boss gonna be one quick draw and $35,000 short.
translation.de: Oder dein Boss verliert eine schnelle Hand und 35 000 $.

translation.en: All right.
Unhitch this horse so's Mary can ride out.
translation.de: Mach das Pferd für Mary los.

translation.en: -You always move so slow? -[Cherokee Bill] You always talk so much?
translation.de: -Bist du immer so langsam? -Redest du immer viel?

translation.en: [Nat] Really?
In the back?
What you think, Beckwourth?
Nah, he wouldn't do that
'cause then I would have to put a bullet in his cranium.
translation.de: weil ich ihm dann das Hirn wegpuste.

translation.en: And we'll never know who the fastest really is now, will we?
translation.de: Dann wissen wir nicht, wer schneller ist.

translation.en: [Cherokee Bill] I gotta hand it to you, boy.
You do know how to make a grand entrance.
translation.de: Du weißt, wie man eine Show abzieht.

translation.en: Shit, I didn't even rehearse that one.
translation.de: Und das hab ich nicht mal geprobt.

translation.en: You know, quick draw, Nat Love is a dead man walking.
translation.de: Weißt du, schnelle Hand, Nat Love ist so gut wie tot.

translation.en: But you don't have to be.
Why don't you get on your horse, get your shit,
translation.de: Hol dein Pferd, pack deine Sachen

translation.en: and go back to whatever it is you call home?
You know that's impossible.
Count down from five?
Five…
Four…
Three…
Why do they always have to count so slow?
translation.de: Wieso müssen die immer so langsam zählen?

translation.en: Blow that bitch, Bill!
translation.de: Jag es in die Luft, Bill!

translation.en: Kill her.
Push!
Trudy's mine.
Let's go.
[Cherokee Bill] Son of a bitch!
Exhale, motherfucker.
[Bass] Come on.
-Where'd they get you? -Shoulder. Get down!
Matches.
You wanna smoke now?
Matches, Bass.
Jump, motherfuckers.
Fuck it.
I always knew it was you
who gave me up.
God knew my heart.
Goodbye, old friend.
Rufus, I didn't have a choice--
I told that kid.
Them damn tricks…
-Sorry, ladies. -[footsteps rapidly approaching]
-You all right, Cuffee? -Just need to reload.
You look hurt, Mr. Pickett.
Ain't nothing but a flesh wound. Maggie ain't ready for me today.
translation.de: Nur 'ne Fleischwunde. Maggie ist noch nicht bereit für mich.

translation.en: What the fuck?
I'll be damned.
[Cuffee] Pickett!
[Cherokee Bill] Now, why you got that look on your face?
No. No, no, no, brother, no, no, no.
Stop that. Don't do that.
You had a choice.
You always got a choice.
[speaking Cherokee] Being scared will only give you bad karma in the afterlife.
translation.de: Angst haben bringt nur ein schlechtes Karma im Jenseits.

translation.en: He didn't even have a chance, you son of a bitch!
translation.de: Er hatte gar keine Chance, Arschloch!

translation.en: You gonna shoot me in the back too? Or cheat the count?
translation.de: Schießt du mir auch in den Rücken? Oder zählst falsch?

translation.en: Beckwourth was faster.
Look after my friend.
[Bass] Nat.
Don't miss.
Pick up your guns.
[Rufus] I know what it is now.
translation.de: Jetzt weiß ich, was es ist.

translation.en: It's the eyes.
Pick 'em up, I said.
[Rufus] Your father,
he was a good man?
He was.
And my mother was a good woman before you cut 'em down.
translation.de: Mutter war eine gute Frau, bevor du sie getötet hast.

translation.en: Seems we had a different upbringing.
I don't care how you was raised.
Now pick up your guns and turn around.
translation.de: Heb die Waffen auf, und dreh dich um.

translation.en: I used to watch my father beat my mother to a pulp
translation.de: Mein Vater prügelte meine Mutter windelweich,

translation.en: if she overcooked his food.
He cut her up real good if she undercooked it too.
translation.de: Und auch, wenn es nicht gar war.

translation.en: One day, I decided to intervene,
and he turned his wrath on me.
translation.de: und er ging auf mich los.

translation.en: My father was not a good man.
translation.de: Mein Vater war kein guter Mensch.

translation.en: Not a good man. He was an outlaw.
Robbin' banks…
He liked to drink.
My mother took a bottle and cut him to protect me.
translation.de: Meine Mutter verletzte ihn mit einer Flasche.

translation.en: He lashed back at her, and just like that, she was gone.
translation.de: Er schlug zurück, und dann war sie tot.

translation.en: Then, like the coward he is,
translation.de: Und weil er so feige war,

translation.en: he took everything we had and left,
translation.de: nahm er alles, was wir hatten, und ging.

translation.en: leaving me with my…
my mother.
I was ten years old, you know…
about the same age you was…
when I gave you that scar.
I had to fend for myself, but I became who I am,
translation.de: Ich musste mich durchschlagen, wurde zu dem, der ich bin.

translation.en: just like you.
As I did, all I could ever think about is wanting my father to pay for what he did.
translation.de: Ich konnte nur daran denken, dass mein Vater dafür bezahlen sollte.

translation.en: I searched for him for years and years, and I could never find him.
translation.de: Ich suchte jahrelang nach ihm und konnte ihn nicht finden.

translation.en: It's like he disappeared off the face of the earth.
I ain't stop though. I kept looking…
until I did find him.
One day…
lo and behold,
there he was, my father,
a new man.
He was clean now.
Sober.
Man of God.
Had a church.
He had a pretty little wife.
And he had a son,
about the age of ten years old,
whose eyes blazed like mine.
You're lyin'.
You're lyin'!
Killing our father was retribution, but--
translation.de: Unseren Vater zu töten war Rache…

translation.en: My father!
My mother!
But it weren't enough.
Letting you live,
that was the true revenge.
Every sin you made, every bank you robbed, everybody you killed.
translation.de: Jede deiner Sünden, jede ausgeraubte Bank, jeder, den du getötet hast.

translation.en: I mean, look at you.
You everything he tried to run away from.
translation.de: Du bist alles, von dem er weglief.

translation.en: Changed his name to "Love."
You a Buck.
You lyin'.
Just like me.
Just like him.
But you better. You gonna surpass even me because…
translation.de: Aber du bist besser. Du übertriffst mich, denn ich könnte…

translation.en: I couldn't kill my brother.
Yet here you are about to kill yours.
[sighs] It's time to take your revenge, Nathaniel Buck.
translation.de: Zeit für deine Rache, Nathaniel Buck.

translation.en: Go on.
-Nathaniel Buck. -No.
Take your revenge.
-[gunshot] -Take your goddamn revenge!
You a Buck.
-Nathaniel-- -[gunshot]
[Mary, softly] Is the Devil dead?
I don't know.
All right, fellas.
You sure the law gonna believe he's dead?
translation.de: Wird das Gesetz glauben, dass er tot ist?

translation.en: I'm the law, Ms. Mary.
If I say a man dead, he dead.
translation.de: Ich sage, ob jemand tot ist.

translation.en: And you?
You sure this what you want?
I always kinda wanted to be a deputy, sheriff, marshal person.
translation.de: Ich wollte schon immer ein Deputy, Sheriff oder Marshal sein.

translation.en: What you lookin' at?
We got work to do, Mr. Love.
translation.de: Auf uns wartet Arbeit, Mr. Love.

translation.en: Let's go.
All right.
♪ And upon my return ♪ ♪ You’ll see a changed soul ♪ ♪ The road was far too long ♪
translation.de: "IM GEDENKEN AN MEINE LIEBEN BRÜDER RICHARD ANTWI UND MICHAEL K. WILLIAMS"
